entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
